ITPO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 04 Young Professional Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 29, 2025, 16:11 IST
 Indian Trade Promotion Organisation
 4 Jobs |  Posted On : 29-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 60,000 to 60,000




FOLLOW

The India Trade Promotion Organisation (ITPO) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Young Professional Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the ITPO Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government JObs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

ITPO Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Young Professional 	04	B.E/ B.Tech

Age Limit for the ITPO Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 32 years

Selection Process for the ITPO Recruitment 2025 

Interview

Salary Structure for the ITPO Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 60,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the ITPO Recruitment 2025 

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the ITPO Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or carer page.
Check for the Young Professional Jobs 025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form and relevant documents to the email address given below.

Email Address

itpocareers@gmail.com

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	28-08-2025
Last Date of Application	26-09-2025

 

Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
